pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared operationg_system = let
  Origen = Lakehouse.Contents(null),
  Navegación = Origen{[workspaceId = "83f751ae-2f96-48a8-b9fb-3622c5d124f1"]}[Data],
  #"Navegación 1" = Navegación{[lakehouseId = "6b0b9104-45d7-4620-987e-e216ce2a989f"]}[Data],
  #"Navegación 2" = #"Navegación 1"{[Id = "operationg_system", ItemKind = "Table"]}[Data],
  #"Columnas quitadas" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Navegación 2", {"environment"})
in
  #"Columnas quitadas";
shared operationg_system_DataDestination = let
  Pattern = Lakehouse.Contents([HierarchicalNavigation = null, CreateNavigationProperties = false, EnableFolding = false]),
  Navigation_1 = Pattern{[workspaceId = "83f751ae-2f96-48a8-b9fb-3622c5d124f1"]}[Data],
  Navigation_2 = Navigation_1{[lakehouseId = "dfcd77b8-649c-4cbd-9727-1dfe16bd48c5"]}[Data],
  TableNavigation = Navigation_2{[Id = "dim_operationg_system", ItemKind = "Table"]}?[Data]?,
  Table = NavigationTable.CreateTableOnDemand(TableNavigation, #table(type table[os_id = nullable Int32.Type, platform = nullable Text.Type, ingestion_date = nullable DateTime.Type, file_date = nullable Text.Type], {}), [DeleteWhenEmpty = true])
in
  Table;
shared DefaultStaging = let
  DefaultStaging = Pipeline.DefaultModelStorage()
in
  DefaultStaging;
[Staging = "FastCopyStaging"]
shared operationg_system_WriteToDataDestination = let
  operationg_system_WriteToDataDestination = Pipeline.ExecuteAction(ValueAction.WithTransaction([Target = operationg_system_DataDestination], (txn) => {TableAction.DeleteRows(txn[Target]), () => TableAction.InsertRows(txn[Target], operationg_system_TransformForWriteToDataDestination), Action.DoNothing}))
in
  operationg_system_WriteToDataDestination;
shared operationg_system_TransformForWriteToDataDestination = let
    SourceTable = Table.SelectColumns(operationg_system, {"os_id", "platform", "ingestion_date", "file_date"})
in
    SourceTable;
shared FastCopyStaging = let
  FastCopyStaging = Pipeline.FastCopyModelStorage(DefaultStaging, [Required = false])
in
  FastCopyStaging;
